text: 10.16 Ais 56.8, Ese 34.23, 37.22-24, Jon 11.52, Epe 2.14, 1 Pi 2.25 Chag sipsip yad ogɨnap sek ak pen, kɨli wali mɨgan anɨb awl yɨl mel agak. Chag sipsip anɨb okok abe poŋɨd ownɨm agak. Pen kɨli takaw yad ak nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Chag sipsip yɨp yɨl mel ak pen, apɨl jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl, bɨ mukep kɨli nokom olap nep mɨdɨl gɨnɨgab agak.
